name: MultiplicationMaster
0:
”Alexa, open multiplication master”
”Alexa, start multiplication master”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: multiplication master
des:
Hone your multiplication skills by practicing with Alexa. Alexa can quiz you on your memory or help you review the multiplication table. Practice with Alexa until multiplication becomes second nature. Perfect for students who have just learned their multiplication facts or for anyone who wants to refresh their skills.

With this skill, you can test your knowledge or review the cards: Say "Alexa, test mode" or "Alexa, review mode" at any time to switch between tasks. Say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. When in test mode, say "Alexa, what's my score" at any point to get your current test score.

Note that this skill was created using a Skill Blueprint so any requests won't be shared with me. Feel free to leave me comments or feature requests in your review.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
